name: equals182.eqftp
title: eqFTP
description: FTP/SFTP client for Brackets. Please restart Brackets manually after update.
author: Alexander <equals182@gmail.com>

en.description: FTP/SFTP client for Brackets. Please restart Brackets manually after update.

ru.description: FTP/SFTP клиент для Brackets. Пожалуйста, перезагрузите Brackets вручную после обновления.

ja.description: Brackets 用 FTP クライアント。更新後は Brackets の再起動が必要です。

ko.description: Brackets 용 FTP/SFTP 클라이언트입니다. 업데이트 설치 후 재시작해 주세요.

it.description: Client FTP/SFTP per Brackets. Riavvia manualmente Brackets dopo l'aggiornamento
